edu.dhbw.t10.manager.keyboard
Class KeymapLoader

java.lang.Object
  edu.dhbw.t10.manager.keyboard.KeymapLoader

public class KeymapLoader
extends java.lang.Object

This is a loader class for a keymap. This is a static class with only a load method for getting a hashmap from a given path to an keymap file

Author:
NicolaiO

Method Detail

load

public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Key> load(java.lang.String filePath)
Load a keymap file. 1. initialize the builder and open XML file 2. loop over all keytypes (control, unicode, char) 2.1. read keytype name 3. for each keytype loop over all keys 3.1. read id and keycode from key 3.2 save key in keymap

Parameters:
filePath - to an keymap XML file
Returns:
HashMap with id->SingleKey

convertType

private static int convertType(java.lang.String stype)
Convert type from String to occording int

Parameters:
stype - like "control", "char", "unicode"
Returns:
keytype like Key.CONTROL etc.
